data.title: Awesome Foundation On the Water Grant / Deadline: Rolling
data.meta_description: Awesome Foundation offers the On the Water Grant which awards $1,000 per month to a water-focused project that brings creativity, culture, and inclusion to the water or provides a new way of thinking about the water. Applicants can be based anywhere in the world. Click here for more information and to apply.
data.text:
Awesome Foundation offers the On the Water Grant which awards $1,000 per month to a water-focused project that brings creativity, culture, and inclusion to the water or provides a new way of thinking about the water. Applicants can be based anywhere in the world.

Click here for more information and to apply.
